grid.expression: SELECT FL.NUNOTA, FL.DATA, VEN.APELIDO AS RESPONSAVEL, R.VLRFRETE FROM sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIO R WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIOFLUXO FL WITH (NOLOCK) ON FL.ORDERID = R.ORDERID AND FL.CODREENVIO = R.CODREENVIO INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFCAB CAB WITH (NOLOCK) ON CAB.NUNOTA = FL.NUNOTA INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFVEN VEN WITH (NOLOCK) ON VEN.CODVEND = CAB.CODVEND --inner join sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIOMOVIMENTO m on m.ORDERID = r.ORDERID WHERE FL.DATA BETWEEN :DTINI AND DATEADD(DAY,1,:DTFIM) AND FL.OCORRENCIA = 'P' --and exists (select 1 from sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIOFLUXO WHERE OCORRENCIA = 'T' AND ORDERID = R.ORDERID AND CODREENVIO = R.CODREENVIO) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIOFLUXO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE OCORRENCIA IN ('C') AND ORDERID = R.ORDERID AND CODREENVIO = R.CODREENVIO) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sankhya.TGFITE ITE WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO PRO WITH (NOLOCK) ON PRO.CODPROD = ITE.CODPROD WHERE NUNOTA = FL.NUNOTA AND CODGRUPOPROD BETWEEN 500000 AND 599999)
